column5: Hey team,  The Lady and I are doing a week long camping tour between the Soo and Wawa and are looking for serviced camping lots in Lake Superior Provincial Park. We are tenting it, so RV services are not needed, just public showers/washrooms etc. I just want a basic and quiet park to enjoy my free time. I'll find my own fishing spots. I'll be doing lots of research, but any tips would be greatly appreciated.  thx
Check out MNR home web site' Might take a little bit of digging?
Last time I was up that way I think we stayed at Pancake Bay, or a camp site near there.  I may have things a little backwards thought, that was about 15 years ago..  Very nice area.
Rabbit Blanket Lake Campground in the park is very nice.  http://www.lakesuperiorpark.ca/index.php?option=com_content&task=blogcategory&id=14&Itemid=83
